result.eng: Turn right at the second crossroads.
result.ga: Cas ar dheis ag an dara crosaire
result.orig: Cas ar dheis ag an dara crosaire
result.html: Cas ar dheis ag an dara crosaireTurn right at the second crossroads.
result.ponchtml: Cas ar ḋeis ag an dara crosaireTurn right at the second crossroads.

result.eng: You will see the shop on the right.
result.ga: Feicfidh tú an siopa ar dheis
result.orig: Feicfidh tú an siopa ar dheis
result.html: Feicfidh tú an siopa ar dheisYou will see the shop on the right.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ tú an siopa ar ḋeisYou will see the shop on the right.

result.eng: Turn right at the next crossroad.
result.ga: Tiontaigh ar dheis ag an chéad chrosbhóthar eile
result.orig: Tiontaigh ar dheis ag an chéad chrosbhóthar eile
result.html: Tiontaigh ar dheis ag an chéad chrosbhóthar eileTurn right at the next crossroad.
result.ponchtml: Tiontaiġ ar ḋeis ag an ċéad ċrosḃóṫar eileTurn right at the next crossroad.

result.eng: And the bedrooms and the bathroom are on the right.
result.ga: Agus tá na seomraí codlata agus seomra folctha ar dheis
result.orig: Agus tá na seomraí codlata agus seomra folctha ar dheis
result.html: Agus tá na seomraí codlata agus seomra folctha ar dheisAnd the bedrooms and the bathroom are on the right.
result.ponchtml: Agus tá na seomraí codlata agus seomra folcṫa ar ḋeisAnd the bedrooms and the bathroom are on the right.

result.eng: Is the toilet the first door on the right?
result.ga: An é an leithreas an chéad doras ar dheis
result.orig: An é an leithreas an chéad doras ar dheis
result.html: An é an leithreas an chéad doras ar dheisIs the toilet the first door on the right?
result.ponchtml: An é an leiṫreas an ċéad doras ar ḋeisIs the toilet the first door on the right?

result.eng: It is there on the right.
result.html: Tá sé ansin ar dheisIt is there on the right.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ansin ar ḋeisIt is there on the right.
